item.title: A1
item.description: Driven by desire to contribute meaningfully to the technology and community, OurKadai Technologies is a consortium of steadfast, passionate & dedicated brains and minds, promoting the culture of Open-Source software. Design and development of web applications, seamless integration of business applications and automation of business process flows, UI/UX are the key areas of interest. OurKadai focuses on highly qualitative, timely delivered and cost-effective e-business solutions and development services. With rich and varied experience in software development, project management capabilities and stringent quality standards, we ensure to develop and deliver products and services of the highest degree.

item.title: A1
item.description: We are digitally native and believe in being digitally ubiquitous Call Us @ (+91) 75984 00628 Mail Us @ operations@ourkadai.com We fly high, yet we stay grounded Plot no.169, INTUC Colony, Pethaniyapuram, Madurai - 625016 Tamil Nadu, India

item.title: A1
item.description: Postgress ConferenceAll You Need to Work with SQL is Just SQLTraditionally, we use Languages and Frameworks interact with Relational Databases. While these are effective in many ways, One problem is that, each of these brings new learning curve. It will be nice if we use SQL itself as the core skill and build application with plain simple SQL skills. In this webinar, I will demo this approach with a case study that builds simple, high performing Java application using Postgres database.

item.title: A1
item.description: MicroservicesAre you in the process of splitting your monolithic application into microservices. We can help you with both what to do and what not to as we did this to many times last few years DevopsDevops can be tricky.Even small mistake can backfire heavily. We can help you with 360 degree approache using everything as a code (Infra, Testing, Code Review and doumentation). Cloud NativeWe can help all the factors that you need to consider to build cloud native apps.

item.title: A1
item.description: Low Code/No CodeAurzartAurzart.com – ‘Made by musician for musician’ as the company slogan proudly pronounces. Not only the music instruments that is being sold, the whole ecommerce site is also solely made by a musician, managed and operated day-in and day-out by a technology novice. Keen to know how this techno-romance unfolded? Here we go! Hats off to Martyn Charles, who is proudly one of the earliest adaptors of no-code platform in India who launched his close to heart online music business in just a week’s time.

item.title: Ourkadai - Methodalogy
item.description: Everyone knows that Software (Industry) is chaging. But what is that change is where confusions starts. As those who observed the industry for last two decades, We beleive the below as the major changes and we optimize us agains each of these aspects Technology is the Manager. Even 60-40 ratio is not enough. Everyone in the team should be technical. We needs work around on the product. Release often is just one part of it.
